thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Global Shares Falter Amid Mixed Economic Data

author: Georgi Kantchev
title: Global Shares Falter Amid Mixed Economic Data

organizations.name: global shares falter amid mixed economic data world

text:
U.S. stocks fell and bond yields rose Tuesday amid mixed data from key global economies and as trade negotiations between the U.S. and China continue.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average declined 161 points, or 0.7%, to 24739, on track to break an eight-session winning streak. Through Monday, the blue-chip index had risen 974 points, or 4.1%, since May 3.
